import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Sports = () => { const [fsport,setfsport]=useState(); const [fplayer,setfplayer]=useState(); console.log(fsport) console.log(fplayer) useEffect(()=>{ },[]) localStorage.setItem("sport",fplayer) localStorage.setItem("player",fsport) return (
) } export default Sports
